title: Trouble Love Attack!
original_name: トラブル・ラブ・アタック！
sinopse:
Sugiyama is madly in love with Akihisa, though he's never confessed to the hot-tempered megane who thinks he's a pervert. When he finally works up the courage he confesses to the wrong twin! Hedonistic Akinori has no problem being his brother's substitute, but will it be enough for Sugiyama?

(Source: MU)
